class.name: UtilityAIBTRunNQSQuery
class.brief_description: Initialites Node Query System queries. They return running until the query has completed.
class.description: The Run NQS Query node can be used to initialite Node Query System queries. They return running until the query has completed.

members.member: A node reference to a NQS Search Space node. (Changed from v1.4 node path).
The number of results the search should return. Overrides the setting on the search space.
